name: Kling v2.1 Standard - Image to Video
display_name: Kling v2.1 Standard - Image to Video
description: Kling 2.1 Standard is a 720p image-to-video model by Kuaishou, offering improved motion realism and prompt adherence with low resource usage.

start_image.description: URL of an image file or base64 to use as the starting frame

negative_prompt.description: Negative prompt to specify what you do not want in the generated video

guidance_scale.description: Guidance scale for controlling how closely the model follows the prompt (CFG)

duration.description: Duration of the video in seconds (5 or 10)
